item.title: Chile’s Sanfic Opens With Cannes Palme d’Or Winner ‘It Was Just an Accident,’ Wraps With Lux Pascal Drama ‘Miss Carbón’
item.description: Chile’s preeminent Santiago International Film Festival (Sanfic) promises some big guns at its 21st edition, opening Aug. 17 with Cannes Palme d’Or winner ‘It Was Just an Accident’ by Iran’s Jafar Pan

item.title: Chilean Stars Alfredo Castro, Paulina García and Benjamín Vicuña Topline Horror Series ‘The Unwelcome’ at Sanfic Series LAB (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: A formidable troika of Chilean thesps – Alfredo Castro (“The Count”), Paulina García(“Gloria”) and Benjamín Vicuña (“Envious”) – have boarded the upcoming horror series by author-screenwriter Ernesto
